title: Katuwapitiya ‡∂∫‡∂Ω‡∑í ‡∂ã‡∂´‡∑î‡∑É‡∑î‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∑Ä‡∑ô‡∂∫‡∑í - Cardinal Malcom Ranjith ‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂∏‡∑í‡∂¥‡∑è‡∂´‡∂±‡∑ä ‡∂ö‡∂ß‡∑î‡∑Ä‡∑è‡∂¥‡∑í‡∂ß‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂ß
description:
Unrest was reported from near the St. Sebastian Church in Katuwapitiya following an incident of alleged vandalizing of a religious statue on the road to the church.

Archbishop of Colombo Rev. Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith arrived at the area to appease the situation.

replies.replyComment: Oya prashne digatama tibuna. Mahinda mahattayage antima awrudu kipayedi church walata gahuwa gini tibba baudda aya kala wage penna. Eth api danan hitiya ewa kale bauddayo newei kiyala. E nisa ewa eliyata yanna nodi haki uparimayen e siddi sabawen hanguwa. Siddi kipayaknam news walata giya. Desha palakayo rekenne api atara prashna hadala. Kawadawath baudda katolika prashna ati karanna ba me rate. Mokada apith pansal yanawa. Baudda darshanaya igena gannawa. Buddagamata garu karanawa. Bauddayoth apith ekka innawa.
